QueryDefinition.Query: select distinct ch.person_id as PersonId, encid, system_name as source_value, note_date, numeric_result, 32858 type_concept_id, 0 source_concept_id, case when system_name = '6CIT' then 35609721 when system_name = 'AD8' then 36684956 when system_name = 'MMSE' then 4169175 when system_name = 'MOCA' then 44808666 when system_name = 'MOCA 2.1' then 44808666 when system_name = 'MOCA 7.1' then 606673 when system_name = 'MOCA 7.2' then 606672 when system_name = 'MOCA 7.3' then 606670 when system_name = 'MOCA 8.1' then 606671 when system_name = 'MOCA 8.1 Blind' then 606671 when system_name = 'MOCA 8.2' then 44808666 when system_name = 'MOCA 8.3' then 44808666 when system_name = 'MOCA Blind' then 44808666 when system_name = 'Minicog' then 37017073 when system_name = 'SLUMS' then 605634 end as concept_id FROM {sc}.alz_assessment l JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND l.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE order by 1
